title: Time Magazine and International Herald Tribune Body Font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120421234454im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Time_4321.jpeg)
This is the body font for Time.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120421234454im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IHT_6201.jpeg)
And this is the body font for IHT.

I'm wondering which fonts are used for these. I tried TNR and Georgia but it's not quite the look.

Thanks
author: imseunghoyang

comments.content: And I'm pretty sure that the [IHT](http://web.archive.org/web/20120421234454/http:/www.newseum.org/todaysfrontpages/hr.asp?fpVname=IHT&ref_pge=lst) is set in [Poynter Old Style Text](http://web.archive.org/web/20120421234454/http:/fontbureau.com/fonts/PoynterOSText). Whole lot of Font Bureau goin' on.
